snippet: The show, at Ricco Maresca, draws on Mr. Batle’s experiences as an inmate who served 20 years in California penitentiaries for fraud and forgery.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews works by Gil Batle at Ricco Maresca gallery.
lead_paragraph: The show, at Ricco Maresca, draws on Mr. Batle’s experiences as an inmate who served 20 years in California penitentiaries for fraud and forgery.

headline.print_headline: In ‘Hatched in Prison,’ Gil Batle Carves Jailhouse Life Onto Ostrich Eggs
headline.main: In ‘Hatched in Prison,’ Gil Batle Carves Jailhouse Life Onto Ostrich Eggs
